articles.description: Interest rates have rise 1.25%
articles.content: Money expert Martin Lewis is urging homeowners to act now before its to late to benefit from cheaper mortgage deals. It comes after the presenter warned borrowers on a fixed rate deal that it will en… [+4799 chars]
